config_definition.entry: Toggle to turn on accelerated decomposition spinup for CN biogeochemistry model

CLM Biogeochemistry mode none = Satellite Phenology (SP) cn = Carbon Nitrogen model cndv = Carbon Nitrogen with Dynamic Global Vegetation Model casa = CASA' model based on Carnegie-Ames-Stanford Approach Carbon-only cycle model (CASA is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)
Toggle to turn on C13 isotopes as part of the CN biogeochemistry model (C13 is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)
User specified C compiler overrides Makefile default (Linux and Darwin only). ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
Toggle to build using CESM makefiles or not. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
User specified C compiler options to append to Makefile defaults. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
Root directory of CLM source distribution (directory above configure).
Component framework interface to use (Model Coupling Toolkit, or Earth System Modeling Framework or variable set at build-time)
User specified CPP defines to append to Makefile defaults. Note: It's recommended to use configure options to set standard CPP values rather than defining them here.
Switch to enable debugging options for Fortran compiler: 0=off, 1=on. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
Toggle to turn on dust module
Toggle to turn on exit spinup mode on for CN biogeochemistry after ad_spinup was run.
User specified Fortran compiler overrides Makefile default. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
User specified Fortran compiler flags to append to Makefile defaults. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
User specified Fortran optimization flags to override Makefile defaults. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
Glacier model number of elevation classes (Setting glc_nec to anything other than 0 or 10 is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)
User specified load options to append to Makefile defaults. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
User specified linker. Overrides the Makefile default $(FC). ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
CESM build machine name and compiler (set by create_newcase)
Maximum number of plant function types (PFT) per gridcell (numpft+1 means use all available) (Setting maxpft to anything other than numpft+1 is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)
CLM coupling mode, ext_cesm is for use with cpl7 scripts, clm_stndln is ONLY for CLM stand-alone testing scripts.
Directory containing MPI include files. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
Directory containing MPI library. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
Name of MPI library. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
Directory containing NetCDF include files. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
Directory containing NetCDF library. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
Directory containing NetCDF module files. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
Toggle to make wild-fires inactive for biogeochemistry=CN mode
Toggle to turn on perturbation error growth test
Toggle to turn on prognostic sea salt
Toggle to turn on river transport module, to run global river routing model to ocean

Flag to turn on site specific special configuration flags for supported single point resolutions. Currently the only special settings are for MEXICOCITY and VANCOUVER, which make changes to urban parameters.
Switch to enable or disable building SMP version (Open-MP) of CLM: 0=off, 1=on. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
Toggle to turn on calculation of SNow and Ice Aerosol Radiation model (SNICAR) radiative forcing (SNICAR_FRC .true.is EXPERIMENTAL NOT SUPPORTED!)
OS for which CLM is being built. The value is the name returned by the "uname -s" command on the target platform. This parameter is to allow cross-compilation (linux,aix,darwin,bgp etc.).
Switch to enable or disable building with a serial-only version of MPI: 0=off, 1=on. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts
User source directories to prepend to the filepath. Multiple directories are specified as a comma separated list with no embedded white space. Normally this is SourceMods/src.clm in your case.

Toggle to turn on coupling of Volatile Organic Compounds module to atmosphere model. ONLY used for CLM stand-alone testing scripts -- NOT used with standard cesm scripts. This is turned on with the CCSM_VOC env_conf.xml in the standard cesm scripts.
